title: Markdown Test

title: Elios Premium: New Features Unveiled! üîì

comments.text: The mock interviews sound amazing! Trying it tonight!
Analytics are super helpful. Worth the upgrade!

title: Ask Elios: Debugging Tips for Dynamic Programming üõ†Ô∏è
content: üí° Struggling with dynamic programming? Ask Elios for tips to debug your DP solutions! Share your toughest DP problem in the comments, and we'll feature the best questions in our next tutorial video! #AskElios

comments.text: Knapsack problem always gets me! Any tips for memoization?
Looking forward to the tutorial! DP is tricky.

title: New Problem Alert: Graph Traversal Challenge! üåê
content: üî• Fresh problem drop! Test your skills with our latest graph traversal problem. Can you solve it in O(V+E) time? Share your approach with #EliosGraph and join the discussion! Let's conquer those graphs together! üöÄ

comments.text: BFS or DFS? What's the best approach here?
Just solved it with DFS! Loving this problem!

title: Elios Meetup: Virtual Coding Jam! üéÆ
content: üìÖ Join us for our first Virtual Coding Jam on Oct 20! Team up, solve problems, and compete for prizes. Register now and show off your coding skills with Eliosers worldwide! #EliosJam

Are teams randomly assigned or can we choose?

title: Elios Tips: Mastering Sliding Window Problems ü™ü
content: üß† Sliding window problems got you stuck? Elios is here to help! Check out our new guide on mastering sliding window techniques and try it with our curated problem set. Share your solutions with #EliosSliding! üí™

comments.text: The guide is super clear! Helped me solve two problems already!
Can Elios explain variable window sizes? Still confused there.

title: Elios Stories: How Elios Helped Me Ace My Interview! üåü
content: üé§ Eliosers, we want to hear your success stories! How has Elios helped you in your coding journey? Share your story with #EliosStories for a chance to be featured and win exclusive merch! üöÄ

title: New Feature: Code Playback in Elios! üìΩÔ∏è
content: üé• Introducing Code Playback! Watch your coding process step-by-step to spot mistakes and optimize solutions. Available now for Premium users. Try it out and let us know what you think! #EliosPlayback

Any plans to bring this to free users?

title: Elios Live: Ask Elios Anything! üéôÔ∏è
content: üì¢ Join our live Q&A session with Elios on Oct 18! Ask your burning coding questions, from algorithms to system design. Submit questions early with #AskEliosLive for a chance to be featured! üöÄ
